metadata.title: CVE-2014-9767 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the ZipArchive::extractTo function inext/zip/php_zip.c in PHP before 5.4.45, 5.5.x before 5.5.29, and 5.6.xbefore 5.6.13 and ext/zip/ext_zip.cpp in HHVM before 3.12.1 allows remoteattackers to create arbitrary empty directories via a crafted ZIP archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
